verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Karuninchi thirigi sama koorchu prabhuvaa kshamaapana ninnu veduchunnaanu{/lang-eng}
{lang-tel}కరుణించి తిరిగి సమకూర్చు ప్రభువా క్షమాపణ నిన్ను వేడుచున్నాను{/lang-tel}
{lang-hin}करुणा से प्रभुजी, वापस दे जो खोया मैं, क्षमा तुझ से, दिल से चाहता हूँ मैं{/lang-hin}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daaveedu raaju deenudai veda aavanilo bondina nastamulanniyu devaa neevu smakoorchitive{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shatru samoohapu kutantramulatho bothiga nenu nasta paditini mithrudesulo sama koorchumu thandri{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pasaru gongali cheeda purugulu naashamu chesina pantanu koorchumaa Yesu prabhoo ninnu veduchunnaanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prema santoshaanandamulanu pradhaana yaajakaa pogottukontini prematho neevu samakoorchumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapapu vishamutho naa paatra nindenu prabhu Yesundanu pindini kalupumu paapa maranamunu tholaginchumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aatmeeya somri thanamulo nundi aatma nastamula nenniyo bonditi aatma devaa neevu sama koorchumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapamu chesi padiyuna chotun praapuga neevu joopumoa prabhuvaa kopaginchaka naapai krupa joopumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Chesina paapamu kappu konaka viswaasamutho oppukondun Siluva rakhtamutho shuddi cheyumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: o1
